api/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotation.title: Namespace System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
api/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotation.keywords: Namespace System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations Classes EmailAddressListAttribute This class validates lists of email addresses. OneOrMoreDigitsAttribute This class validates a property that should contain one or more digits. OneOrMoreNonAlphaAttribute This class validates a property that should contain one or more non alphanumeric character. OneOrMoreUpperCaseAttribute This class validates a property that should contain one or more upper case character. PhoneListAttribute This class validates lists of phone numbers. RequiredWhenAttribute This class is a validation attribute that indicates when a property is required by checking the state of an associated boolean property.

System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext validationContext The validation context to use for the operation. Returns Type Description System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult The results of the validation. Overrides System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute.IsValid(System.Object, System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
